articles.author: Natasha Lomas
articles.title: Meta’s ‘consent or pay’ data grab in Europe faces new complaints - TechCrunch
articles.description: A controversial move by Meta last year, when it switched to charging users in the European Union for an ad-free subscription to Facebook and/or Instagram Meta is facing a fresh set of complaints from consumer protection authorities in the EU over a controvers…
articles.content: A controversial move by Meta last year, when it switched to charging users in the European Union for an ad-free subscription to Facebook and/or Instagram unless they agreed to be tracked and profiled… [+9374 chars]
